===Browsing===
A ten minute delayed browsable SubVersion archive is available here:
 http://source.erland.isaksson.info/viewvc.cgi/slimserver/
===Command-Line Access===
====Project members====
Project members authenticate over HTTPS to allow committing changes.
If you plan to make changes, use this command to check out the code as yourself using HTTPS:

*{{{Custom Browse}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/CustomBrowse/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/CustomBrowse/trunk CustomBrowse --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Custom Scan}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/CustomScan/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/CustomScan/trunk CustomScan --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Custom Skip}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/CustomSkip/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/CustomSkip/trunk CustomSkip --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Database Query}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/DatabaseQuery/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/DatabaseQuery/trunk DatabaseQuery --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Dynamic Playlist}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/DynamicPlayList/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/DynamicPlayList/trunk DynamicPlayList --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{iPod}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/iPod/trunk/src browse]) *Unfinished*
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/iPod/trunk iPod --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Multi Library}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/MultiLibrary/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/MultiLibrary/trunk MultiLibrary --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Random Playlist}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/RandomPlayList/trunk/src browse])
 {{{svn checkout https://erlandplugins.googlecode.com/svn/RandomPlayList/trunk RandomPlayList --username yourgooglecodeid}}}

*{{{Remove Played Songs}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/RemovePlayedSongs/trunk/src browse])

*{{{SQL Playlist}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/SQLPlayList/trunk/src browse])

When prompted, enter your generated [http://code.google.com/hosting/settings googlecode.com password].

====Anonymous access====
Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:

*{{{Custom Browse}}}* ([http://code.google.com/p/erlandplugins/source/browse/CustomBrowse/trunk/src browse])
